oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pleasant Franklin Shrum copyprint
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Copyprint photograph of Cpl. Pleasant Franklin Shrum, Co. I, 9th Ky. Inf. Regt., USA. Shrum was born on May 2, 1830, in Smith County, Tennessee. He mustered in on Nov. 26, 1861 in Columbia, Kentucky, and served 3 years before mustering out on December 15, 1864, in Louisville, Kentucky. Shrum died on June 14, 1884, and is buried in the Green Grove Cemetery in Macon County, Tennessee. Shrum wears a state of Kentucky issued military jacket. The 9th Ky. Inf. Regt., USA was part of the Army of the Cumberland.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Shrum, Pleasant Franklin
